entries.title: Hotfix
entries.text:
- Fixed some missing corner tiles in the environment 
-Platforms now come back if the player falls off while theyâ€™re moving

entries.title: Hotfix
entries.text:
- Synced main menu and pause menu settings across scenes 
- Fixed pause menu button input not working after changes in display settings

entries.title: Update
entries.text:
- Completed Crystal Caverns 
- Added new enemies and bosses 
- Introduced new player mechanics 
- Implemented a main menu and pause menu 
- Fixed bugs and improved performance
